```{r}

mostra1
```

Teoricament, $E(x)=n,\quad Var(x)=2n$

```{r}
mostra2 = rchisq(10, 50)
mean(mostra2)
var(mostra2)
hist(mostra2)
plot(density(mostra2))
```

```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
hist(mostra2, prob=T)
plot(density(mostra2))
```
